features: 【Wider Seat】The 25.5’’ seat width and 19.8’’ seat depth provide you with more space and higher comfort. Wider seats to accommodate your different sitting positions.
🔥【Height adjustable & Tilt 105°~120°】 the original modern design chair could be adjusted from 30.9” to 35.04”. Tilt Angle: 105°~120°. Apply to mostly desk.

🔥【EASY TO INSTALL】 - Vanity chair comes with all hardware & necessary tools, and also detailed instructions. If you encounter any problems during installation, you can check the installation video for help. For your convenience, all accessories have extra backups. It is easy to assemble this office chair by yourself at office or home in 20 minutes.

【Premium Material】Cushion filled with high-density sponge along with padded backrest, this wide office chair is made for sedentary users, offering a cozy sitting experience even after long-time sitting. Upgraded Furry fabric is durable and comfortable. Elegant look to accent any style of space.

🔥【WARRANTY & GUARANTEE】 - Customer satisfaction is our most pursuit! we provide 90 days free return GUARANTEE and 2 years WARRANTY. Plus, Our professional customer service team will help you solve any problem, please feel free to contact us.
🔥Warm tips: There may be color differences between the pictures and the actual product on different monitors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy yet comfy chair for home studio/office
reviews.reviewText: I love the wide and deep seat base of this chair. It’s so comfortable, and the ivory color looks so clean and classy in my studio/office. The fabric is soft. I put it together myself with no issues, instructions were easy to understand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Even better than I expected
reviews.reviewText: I have to admit, I was a little bit skeptical to buying this chair. It's not a known brand, and the product info and photos was kinda limited. But, I couldn't find any other chair that matched what I was looking for — a wide seat so that I can sit cross legged while I work all day long.Since Amazon in Europe didn't have the same chair, I ordered it from the US. Shipping was extremely fast, in less than a week it had traveled from California to Spain, passed customs and was delivered to my doorstep. Assembling the chair took 15 minutes max.The chair itself looks way better in real life than in the photos. It has some orange/grey threads in the fabric, which means it isn't white-white (good for me, because I didn't want a white chair). It's really comfy, and it's definitively wide enough to sit cross legged and in any other position with my legs up. I also love that you can adjust the amount of tilt on the chair.I'm really happy with the chair, and can definitively recommend it to anyone else who can't sit straight in a normal chair for more than 5 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Broke within six months of purchase
reviews.reviewText: I initially really liked the chair because it has a wider seat and is comfy to sit in. Looks aesthetically pleasing as well. However, a few issues with structural quality:1. some miscuts on the metal made it difficult to assemble as some screw holes were covered up.2. after a few months of use one one of the screws holding the back to the base broke in half. The chair collapsed as a result, causing me to fall out -- luckily uninjured.Edit: customer service was very helpful and reached out to replace all broken parts. Adjusted rating accordingly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The chair is amazing! Very comfortable and fits right into my aesthetic. It’s big enough but yet small enough it fix into my desk ! Easy to put together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dark beige, not white.
reviews.reviewText: I’m going to keep this because it is cute and I took the time to put it together and taking it apart to return it would be a lot of work. That being said, there are two issues:1) it is a dark beige weave and part of the weave is straight up yellow. It photographs very light but is almost tan in person2) the seat is wide enough to sit cross legged but not as deep as I was expecting. This is good because I won’t be very far from my computer when typing but I’m definitely sitting up very straight to accommodate the lack of depth so I won’t be relaxing much in the chair like I imagined.Over all, it’s pretty, wasn’t too hard to assemble, and has good cushion. I paid $210 for it (with wheels) and would be very happy with it at about half of that price. At $210 I’m just a little underwhelmed.Tip: when assembling, it goes together easier if you use the weight of the bottom chair to push it down on the back of the chair, so I assembled with the back of the chair flag on the table and the seat of the chair perpendicular to it. This helped the holes align easier. Otherwise it might have taken another set of hands to hold them together while I screwed it in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm really pleased with this chair
reviews.reviewText: I've only ever written 1 or 2 reviews on Amazon, but I really like this chair and thought I should do one on it.I received the chair promptly, and it looked pretty close to what the photos show. I've seen some other reviews that complained about it having too many orange threads or whatever, but I didn't find that to be a problem. To be fair, there are orange threads in the upholstery fabric, as well as charcoal gray and "neutral" tan ones. From a bit of a distance it looks like the photos in the listing. From up close, you can see the individual threads, but it doesn't look any different than I expected. I'm perfectly happy on that front.Comfort-wise, I love it. The foam on the seat and backrest is comfy and supportive. And the chair is _wide_ and gently curved. I love it. I'm 6'2" and 245 pounds, not a small guy, but not obese or anything. Although, if that's how you roll, this would be an excellent chair for you. But I do like to sit in various positions, cross-legged, normal feet-on-ground, half-crossed switching from side-to-side (I hope that makes sense). This chair allows that, with no weird parts or sections digging into your. I've had plenty of chairs over the years that were built for 180 pound butts sitting with both feet on the ground, and if you differed from that, you paid a price. Not with this chair.And I guess finally, assembly was easy. Took about 15 minutes. The most confusing part was siguring out how to attach the "control module" (the part that raises/lowers the chair and adjusts tilt) to the seat. When you're looking at the bottom of the seat, the front edge of the seat is farthest away from the various bolt holes. On the control module, there is a not-very-noticeable arrow that should point to the front edge of the seat.And the instructions emphasize only screwing in the bolts loosely at first. That is the truth. If you screw the first one or two in too tight to start off with, you won't be able to get the last two in correctly. They'll be trying to go in at an angle, which won't work. Back all bolts out to just finger tightness, get them all in place like that, then go back and tighten them down completely.So yeah, great chair so far. Today was my first day of actually sitting in it. So we'll see how it holds up over the coming months/years. I'll update if anything notable changes, but so far I'm very happy.
While this chair is comfortable, it could use a couple of inches more padding at this price point.It looks nice and seems well made, but for as much as you pay, it really needs more cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Considering how much this chair cost I was expecting better quality. After using it for two weeks it has become very wobbly, after checking that everything was still screwed in tight I've noticed it seems to be a split in the join on the chair. As someone who works from home sitting comfortably is important to me and this just misses the mark.Updated to add that the chair has now broken.

If you’re like me, you’ve done your research for an aesthetic wide-seated desk chair and realized there isn’t much on the market. When I came across this chair, I was so excited because it had the style and function I was looking for! But like most things these days, the $400 price point does not reflect the quality.Pros:Wide enough to cross my legsAdjustable seat so I can fit under my desk while cross leggedTilts/swivelsCons:No lumbar supportSeat is not comfy for more than an hour so I sit on a pillowColour has more flecks of orange/pink than shown in the picture (luckily I have terracotta accents in my office so it matches well)Already squeaky and only had for less than a monthOverall, I like the chair for its intended purpose but wish it had more of those details that you would expect in a $400 chair.
It was good at first but the padding has worn out and I can feel the mechanism underneath.
